name: ZEUS
description:
Being
From the time of birth till the moment of death, “human existence” demands things and manipulates objects. After the invention of the steam engine, humans alone were consid- ered to be the authority; and they perceived themselves as the rulers of everything. This put them in a position called “the modernity”. This new achievement of humans repre- sented a revolution so as to prove their existence. All the events that happened from the birth to the death of modern human beings, created a period, in which life can be noticed yet its presence cannot be felt.
